response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to extend an offer to purchase it at a price that reflects its true worth. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,150,000. This offer not only ensures that you secure this valuable asset at a price that is highly favorable but also allows me to maximize the return on my investment.
